title: Indian firm paying British PM Sunak’s wife US$13 million a year still operating in Russia despite Ukraine war: report
description: Infosys is owned by Rishi Sunak’s billionaire father-in-law, with US$13 million a year in dividends going to Akshata Murty, Sunak’s wife; IT company said in March it was leaving Russia but still has staffed office and is paying two subcontractors.
dc:creator: Business Insider
author: Business Insider
